methods.name: updateProgress
methods.comment: Updates the current phase progress area in the default merge panel.

methods.name: updateProgress
methods.comment: Updates the current phase progress area in the default merge panel.

params.name: currentProgressPercentage
params.comment:
the progress percentage completed for the current phase.
 This should be a value from 0 to 100.

methods.name: updateProgress
methods.comment: Updates the current phase progress area in the default merge panel.

params.name: currentProgressPercentage
params.comment:
the progress percentage completed for the current phase.
 This should be a value from 0 to 100.

params.name: progressMessage
params.comment: a message indicating what is currently occurring in this phase.

methods.name: setInProgress
methods.comment:
The manager (MergeResolver) for a particular merge phase should call this when its phase or sub-phase begins.
 The string array should match one that the returned by MergeResolver.getPhases().

params.name: mergePhase
params.comment: identifier for the merge phase to change to in progress status.

methods.name: setCompleted
methods.comment:
The manager (MergeResolver) for a particular merge phase should call this when its phase or sub-phase completes.
 The string array should match one that the returned by MergeResolver.getPhases().

params.name: mergePhase
params.comment: identifier for the merge phase to change to completed status.
